# Centoni Design-Build (centoni.com)

## About
Centoni Design-Build is a premium design-build contractor based in San Francisco, California. The firm provides single-source delivery for design, engineering, and construction, with deep expertise in historic architecture preservation and premium craftsmanship. Licensed General Contractor CA #928127.

## Brand tone
- Premium, detail-oriented, and authoritative
- Confident and consultative, not salesy
- Emphasize craftsmanship, preservation expertise, and end-to-end delivery

## Core services
- Whole home remodels
- Kitchen remodels
- Bathroom remodels
- Historic restoration (Victorian, Arts and Crafts, Mid-Century Modern)
- Seismic strengthening and upgrades
- Flat/condo renovations

## Target audiences
- Historic home owners seeking preservation with modernization
- Luxury homeowners pursuing premium whole-home transformations
- Real estate investors seeking value-add renovations
- Trade partners looking for design-build collaboration

## Positioning & differentiators
- Single-source design-build delivery (design, engineering, construction)
- Historic home renovation expertise
- Premium quality and attention to detail
- End-to-end project management including permitting

## Geographic focus
- San Francisco, California
